navigation-rule.description: The decision rule used by the NavigationHandler to determine which view must be displayed after the current view, html.jsp is processed.

navigation-case.description: Indicates to the NavigationHandler that the svg.jsp view must be displayed if the Action referenced by a UICommand component on the html.jsp view returns the outcome "success".

navigation-rule.description: The decision rule used by the NavigationHandler to determine which view must be displayed after the current view, svg.jsp is processed.

navigation-case.description: Indicates to the NavigationHandler that the html.jsp view must be displayed if the Action referenced by a UICommand component on the svg.jsp view returns the outcome "success".
Indicates to the NavigationHandler that the xul-restore.jsp view must be displayed if the Action referenced by a UICommand component on the svg.jsp view returns the outcome "xul-restore".
Indicates to the NavigationHandler that the xul-apply.jsp view must be displayed if the Action referenced by a UICommand component on the svg.jsp view returns the outcome "xul-apply".
Indicates to the NavigationHandler that the xul-valid.jsp view must be displayed if the Action referenced by a UICommand component on the svg.jsp view returns the outcome "xul-valid".
Indicates to the NavigationHandler that the xul-update.jsp view must be displayed if the Action referenced by a UICommand component on the svg.jsp view returns the outcome "xul-update".
Indicates to the NavigationHandler that the xul-invoke.jsp view must be displayed if the Action referenced by a UICommand component on the svg.jsp view returns the outcome "xul-invoke".
Indicates to the NavigationHandler that the xul-render.jsp view must be displayed if the Action referenced by a UICommand component on the svg.jsp view returns the outcome "xul-render".

navigation-rule.description: The decision rule used by the NavigationHandler to determine which view must be displayed after the current view, xul-restore.jsp is processed.

navigation-case.description: Indicates to the NavigationHandler that the svg.jsp view must be displayed if the Action referenced by a UICommand component on the xul-restore.jsp view returns the outcome "xul-back".

navigation-rule.description: The decision rule used by the NavigationHandler to determine which view must be displayed after the current view, xul-apply.jsp is processed.

navigation-case.description: Indicates to the NavigationHandler that the svg.jsp view must be displayed if the Action referenced by a UICommand component on the xul-apply.jsp view returns the outcome "xul-back".

navigation-case.description: Indicates to the NavigationHandler that the svg.jsp view must be displayed if the Action referenced by a UICommand component on the xul-update.jsp view returns the outcome "xul-back".
